title: Loading Screen Bug
body: I have this bug everytime i am in loading screen. This only happened when i downloaded patch 5.22

replies.body: Same here ;-; SOMEBODY HELP ASAP PLEASE I TRIED TO ASK RITO SO I'M WAITING FOR THEIR FEEDBACK. BUT IF SOMEBODY CAN HELP US FIX THIS IT RN IT WOULD BE GREAT :(((({{champion:157}}
I have the some problem still after patching to 5.23
I am also having this problem, but Riot's instructions haven't solved anything.
I also have this problem hopefully Riot will notice this bug and fix it.
I'm having this problem also. It's really annoying and I don't know how to fix it or anything.
Same someone help plz. I Emailed Riot, and they told me to fix my files but still nothing.
Same issue here. Among other things.
I have the same problem,this is really anyoing ..can we get an answer ? how can we fix this..
Im havin the same problem :( how can we fix that ?!? please
I have the same issue. I been messing with settings and it is not working at all still.

I contacted RiotSupport on Twitter and they pretty much told me

> It may be the Client having trouble connecting to your computer, not your internet xD

https://twitter.com/RiotSupport/status/664621084247920640

____________________________________________

So the question is: What function tells to use the images from C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.168\deploy\assets\images\champions onto the Loading Screen.

It's also noteworthy that there were like 700 "Centered" images for all Base/Skins for every champion, this patch. So i wonder if that caused a problem.
Me to idk what is that maybe a bug who knows
